timeline: Approximately 6 months after Chapter 10, Free Level has been operating successfully
location: SSS Headquarters (Alpha levels), Level 9 Sector 4 (Free Level), Community Center

knows: She's undercover as Beta worker 'Elara Frost' fleeing gambling debts
Her mission is to infiltrate Free Level and identify funding source
Level 9 population up 40%, resource consumption up significantly
Free Level provides free housing, food, medical care
Jax Varro is the name associated with Free Level
Ashton wants to know if this is a threat to station security
Her genetic markers have been temporarily altered to read Beta
The Free Level operation appears genuine, not a scam
Mother Sera is watching her with suspicion
Jax sees through some of her cover story
She's attracted to Jax (disturbing to her)
Elara Quinn.emotional_state: Professionally controlled but increasingly conflicted, attracted to Jax, disturbed by her own reactions, questioning her assumptions

knows: Free Level has been operating for 6 months successfully
Population is growing, Gammas migrating from Level 8
Elara Frost is new arrival, claims to be Beta fleeing debts
She's observant and analytical, possibly hiding something
She's not desperate like most arrivals
He's attracted to her despite his wariness
Mother Sera is watching the situation
Jax Varro.emotional_state: Cautiously intrigued, attracted but wary, carrying weight of Free Level responsibility

knows: Level 9 showing unusual activity patterns
Someone is funding Free Level with billions
Gammas are voluntarily moving to Level 9
This could be a threat to station order
Elara is his best investigator
Director Ashton.emotional_state: Suspicious, controlling, anxious (shown by hand tremor)

knows: Elara is new and being watched
Jax is attracted to her
Something is off about Elara Frost

revealed_to_reader: Director Marcus Ashton has a hand tremor that appears when stressed (PLANTED - his genetic secret)
Elara Quinn is an SSS Senior Investigator sent undercover
Her cover identity is 'Elara Frost,' Beta worker fleeing gambling debts
Her genetic markers have been temporarily altered to read Beta instead of Alpha
Free Level has been operating for 6 months with significant growth
Population up 40%, resource consumption up 30-60% in various areas
Gammas are voluntarily moving from Level 8 to Level 9
Station Security views charity as more suspicious than crime
Free Level provides genuine help - housing, food, medical care, education
Drift use is declining in Free Level sectors
Mother Sera is the unofficial leader/elder of the undercity
Jax runs community meetings and actively manages Free Level operations
Elara and Jax have immediate chemistry and mutual attraction
Jax is perceptive enough to see through part of Elara's cover
Elara is already feeling compromised by her attraction and sympathy

planted.significance: First physical hint of his genetic secret - instability from illegal modification
Character tell for Elara to eventually recognize
Sera will warn Jax, creating tension
Romance developing across power imbalance and deception

planted.element: Elara's first doubts about caste system
planted.significance: Beginning of her arc - questioning beliefs

planted.element: Free Level has real coffee from actual beans
planted.significance: Shows Jax is spending on quality of life, not just survival

active_tensions: Elara's undercover mission versus growing sympathy for Jax
Attraction between Elara and Jax built on deception
Station authority monitoring Free Level growth
Jax sensing something off about Elara but being drawn to her anyway
Elara's mission to determine if Free Level is a threat
Elara questioning her assumptions about Gammas and castes
world_changes: Free Level has been operating successfully for 6 months
Station Security Services now actively monitoring the situation
Elara Quinn is embedded in the community undercover
